text: Jab kabhi koi surat is mazmoun (topic) ki nazil hui ke Allah ko maano aur uske Rasool ke saath milkar jihad karo to tumne dekha ke jo log in mein se saahib e maqdarat (capable people) thay wahi tumse darkhwast karne lage ke unhein jihad ki shirkat se maaf rakkha jaye, aur unhone kaha ke humein chodh dijiye ke hum baithne walon ke saath rahein
